newsitem.title: GREECE: CAR BOMB INJURES WIFE OF SENIOR ISLAND POLICEMAN.
newsitem.headline: CAR BOMB INJURES WIFE OF SENIOR ISLAND POLICEMAN.

text.p: The wife of a senior Greek policeman on the island of Crete was seriously injured on Tuesday when a bomb blew up her car in what police said was probably a local crime hit.
The wife of the police chief of the main city of Iraklio, Costas Soldatos, was in hospital in serious condition, police on Crete said.
"The bomb exploded as soon as she turned on the engine," a policeman said.
Police said similar attacks on Crete in the past had been attributed to local crime rings.
